name: CluttR
description:
CluttR is a small project I challenged myself to put together in 24 hours while trying to learn Unity without following a tutorial. 

The objective of CluttR is to last as long as possible, you'll want to shoot enemies and avoid filling up the space you have with clutter; trapping yourself in.

The game isn't super buggy however there's a lack of features for things like getting unstuck or keeping track of score. I don't plan for there to be a future for CluttR any time soon but I may come back to re-making CluttR once I have learnt a lot more.

Controls:

Movement: WASD / Arrow keys

Shooting: Left-Click

Respawn: Left-Click

Hide Timer: T
(Your final time will be shown on death.)
